mapper.insert: insert into hz_vm_network (network_id, network_name, gateway, binding_id, vlan_group_id, binding_type, `type`) values (#{networkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{networkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gateway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vlanGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindingType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update hz_vm_network set network_name = #{networkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gateway = #{gateway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, binding_id = #{bindingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vlan_group_id = #{vlanGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, binding_type = #{bindingType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where network_id = #{networkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select network_id, network_name, gateway, binding_id, vlan_group_id, binding_type, `type` from hz_vm_network where network_id = #{networkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select network_id, network_name, gateway, binding_id, vlan_group_id, binding_type, `type` from hz_vm_network
